description: This file defines a Flutter splash screen widget that displays a loading indicator while checking user authentication status, then navigates to either the dashboard or login screen based on authentication.

classes.name: SplashScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget responsible for displaying a splash/loading screen during app startup.

classes.name: _SplashScreenState
classes.description: The private State class that manages the behavior of SplashScreen, including authentication check and navigation.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state, sets up a post-frame callback to check authentication and navigate accordingly.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the splash screen, displaying a centered CircularProgressIndicator.
